scripts.dev: concurrently -n "NEXT,ELECTRON,SERVER,WEB" -c "yellow,blue,green,magenta" --kill-others "npm -w ducksy-ui run dev" "npm -w ducksy-app run electron" "npm -w ducksy-server run dev" "npm -w ducksy-web run dev"
scripts.dev:app: concurrently -n "NEXT,ELECTRON" -c "yellow,blue" --kill-others "npm -w ducksy-ui run dev" "npm -w ducksy-app run electron"
scripts.build: npm -w ducksy-ui run build && npm -w ducksy-app run build
